entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023
